body_html:
Default parameters in translate are set to quite large values. Large models trained over a long time give good results, but it might take too long or use too much memory for your GPU. You can request to train a smaller model as in the following example.

python translate.py
  --data_dir [your_data_directory] --train_dir [checkpoints_directory]
  --size=256 --num_layers=2 --steps_per_checkpoint=50
body_text:
Default parameters in translate are set to quite large values. Large models trained over a long time give good results, but it might take too long or use too much memory for your GPU. You can request to train a smaller model as in the following example.
python translate.py
  --data_dir [your_data_directory] --train_dir [checkpoints_directory]
  --size=256 --num_layers=2 --steps_per_checkpoint=50
body:
Default parameters in translate are set to quite large values. Large models trained over a long time give good results, but it might take too long or use too much memory for your GPU. You can request to train a smaller model as in the following example.
``` python
python translate.py
  --data_dir [your_data_directory] --train_dir [checkpoints_directory]
  --size=256 --num_layers=2 --steps_per_checkpoint=50
```
